tatra api gārhasthya vihitānām karmaṇām svādhyāyasya prādhānya pradarśana artham ucyate śucau

original: vivikte 'medhyādirahite deśe yatāvadāsīnaḥ svādhyāyamadhīyāno naityakamadhikaṃ ca
analyzed: vivikte medhya ādi rahite deśe yata avadāsīnaḥ svādhyāyam adhīyānaḥ naityakam adhikam ca
yathāśakti ṛk ādi abhyāsam ca kurvan dhārmikān putrān śiṣyān ca dharma yuktān vidadhat dhārmika tvena
tān niyamayan ātmani sva hṛdaye hārde brahmaṇi sarva indriyāṇi saṃpratiṣṭhāpya upasaṃhṛtya indriya grahaṇāt karmāṇi
ca saṃnyasya ahiṃsa hiṃnsām para pīḍām akurvan sarva bhūtāni sthāvara jaṅgamāni bhūtāni apīḍayan iti arthaḥ
bhikṣā nimittam aṭana ādinā api para pīḍā syāt iti atas āha anyatra tīrthebhyaḥ
tīrtham nāma śāsra anujñā viṣayaḥ tatas nyatra iti arthaḥ
sarva āśramiṇām ca etat samānam tīrthebhyaḥ nyatra hiṃsā eva iti

original: anye varṇayanti kuṭumba evaitatsarvaṃ kurvansa khalvadhikṛto yāvadāyuṣaṃ yāvajjīvamevaṃyathoktena prakāreṇaiva vartayanbrahmalokamabhisaṃpadyatedehānte
analyzed: anye varṇayanti kuṭumbe eva etat sarvam kurvan sa khalu adhikṛtaḥ yāvadāyuṣam yāvajjīvam evam yathā uktena prakāreṇa eva vartayan brahma lokam abhisaṃpadyate dehānte
na ca punar āvartate śarīra grahaṇāya
punarāvṛtteḥ prāptāyāḥ pratiṣedhāt

original: arcirādinā mārgeṇa kāryabrahmalokabhisaṃpadya yāvadbrahmalokasthitistāvattatraiva tiṣṭhati prāktato nā'vartata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: arciḥ ādinā mārgeṇa kārya brahmaloka abhisaṃpadya yāvat brahmaloka sthitiḥ tāvat tatra eva tiṣṭhati prāk tatas na āvartate iti arthaḥ
dvis abhyāsaḥ upaniṣad vidyā parisamāpti arthaḥ
iti chāndogyopaniṣadi aṣṭama adhyāyasya pañcadaśaḥ khaṇḍaḥ
iti śrīmat govinda bhagavat pūjya pāda śiṣya paramahaṃsa par ivrājaka ācārya śrīmat śaṅkara bhagavat pāda kṛtau chāndogya upaniṣad vivaraṇe aṣṭamaḥ dhyāyaḥ
